snippet: The police were investigating whether the man, who sustained life-threatening injuries, had set himself on fire on the National Mall.
abstract: Police in Washington, DC, are investigating whether a man, who sustained life-threatening injuries, had set himself on fire on the National Mall.
lead_paragraph: The police were investigating whether the man, who sustained life-threatening injuries, had set himself on fire on the National Mall.

headline.main: Man on Fire Is Hospitalized in Washington
headline.print_headline: Man on Fire Is Hospitalized In Washington
